question: Kafara of Swear
answer:
QUESTION
If a person says to himself ?I swear of Allah i.e Allah ki qassam I don?t want to do Hasad, Keena, Hate, Proud (Takabur), Ria etc?. Now what can make the kafara of swear wajib on him. It should be noted he is saying I don?t want to do. He is not saying I will no do.
ANSWER


Share:
There is no Kaffaarah in this case.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Moulana Imraan Vawda
FATWA DEPT.
